entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
